[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/2665288.png” bottom_divider_style=”wave2″ bottom_divider_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_post_title meta=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_color=”#FFFFFF” title_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_post_title][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-inner.png” background_size=”contain” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/firewall.jpg” alt=”firewall installation in South India” title_text=”firewall configuration services” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”71%” module_alignment=”center” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#363636” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Firewall Installation in South India

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]
TRACE EXTENSIVE PRODUCTIVITY WITH FixLab LLC

Productivity comes with making best out of the available resources. Firewall installations is crucial part in every industry to keep a check on effective internet usage. FixLab grants the best team for Firewall installations in South India, to control and transform internet usage to productive usage.

Our firewall installation service has expert system engines well-acquainted with firewall solution in INDIA provides evert support and expertise in firewall installation and maintenance. It is best to partner with a good firewall installation in South India during your elevation phase in a proactive model.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(0,168,190,0.09)” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/h3-bg-section-02.jpg” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”3px||7px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Features Of Firewall Installation

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” transform_translate_linked__hover=”off” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1”][et_pb_blurb title=”STREAMLINES MANAGEMENT” image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/003-firewall-2.png” alt=”streamlines data management” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Firewall solution in INDIA, supports centralized management bringing work efficiency in your office. Get a flexible and reliable reporting service, to be in help for your every concern with best IT support in South India.

We analyze your business requirements, and install, configure firewalls with customized protection needs.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”VIRUS PROTECTION” image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/005-computer-1.png” alt=”network protection” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The best firewall installation in South India, ensures safety of the system, it protects your network from malware attacks.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”46%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”SYNCHRONISED SECURITY” image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/004-server.png” alt=”endpoints protection” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We provide coherent communication with firewall and endpoints to act immediately under any threatening activity over your network.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”PROMOTE PRODUCTIVITY” image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/002-firewall-1.png” alt=”prevent internet unwanted usage” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#363636” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

It keeps a check on unwanted usage of internet, rather than for the work requirements. Maintains employees productive internet while restricting downloading music, movies, etc. that are unrelated to work.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/banner-about-us-1.png” custom_padding=”48px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Types Of Firewalls

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”54%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”Hardware firewalls” alt=”technology” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#229DD1” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Anyone on a broadband connection, hardware firewalls are an important part of your system. It is more popularly found in broadband routers. It protects every system on a local network and also does not majorly require any configuration.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” border_width_top=”5px” border_color_top=”#363636” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” box_shadow_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” box_shadow_color__hover=”#363636” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_width_top__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” border_width_top__hover=”5px” border_color_top__hover_enabled=”on|hover” border_color_top__hover=”#229DD1” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover=”0px|-10px” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|hover”][et_pb_blurb title=”Software firewalls ” alt=”settings” image_icon_width=”75%” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#229DD1” header_font_size=”14px” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Software firewalls are popular among individual home users. It enables some control over its protection and function features. It offers wide ranges of protection from outside access on your computer and also from trojan programs or e-mail worms. Its features also includes privacy controls, web filtering etc.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”rgba(0,168,190,0.09)” background_image=”http://fixlab.co.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/h3-bg-section-02.jpg” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”3px||7px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||23px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” header_2_font=”|600|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_font_size=”40px” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”25px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHY CHOOSE US?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”12px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”12px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

To be the best Firewall installation in South India we provide services incorporating with all major brands such as Fortinet/ Fortigate Firewall Solution in INDIA, Sonic Wall Firewall Solutions in South India, CISCO Firewall Solutions in Dubai, Cyberoam Firewall Solution in South India and Sophos Firewall Solution in INDIA and Antivirus Solutions in South India.We provide new installations, firewall license renewals, firewall AMC services, remote support, IT helpdesk, and global remote support to ensure the security and reliability of your network.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjIzMDEyMSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Contact Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” custom_padding=”10px|35px|10px|35px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”6px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” width=”47%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#363636” header_2_line_height_tablet=”” header_2_line_height_phone=”1.2em” header_2_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FAQ

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_accordion open_toggle_text_color=”#363636” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” toggle_text_color=”#363636” toggle_font=”|700|||||||” toggle_font_size=”17px” toggle_line_height=”1.3em” body_text_color=”#000000″ body_font_size=”12px” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|20px|20px|20px|20px” border_color_all=”#363636” border_width_top=”5px” global_colors_info=”{}” body_line_height=”1.5em” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is a firewall?” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_font_size=”14px” open=”off” sticky_enabled=”0″]

A firewall is a virtual or physical network security appliance that monitors incoming and outgoing network traffic and acts as a secure ‘wall’ between the public internet and network.

[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How do firewalls work?” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_font_size=”14px” open=”off”]Firewalls work with different security services like content filtering, anti-virus, intrusion prevention, stateful packet inspection and more to protect data and users on a private network.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How many firewalls do I need?” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_font_size=”14px” open=”off”]A business organization may require multiple firewalls depending on the size of the network to secure their branch offices and remote outposts.[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”Is VPN a firewall?” open=”off” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_font_size=”14px”]VPN or Virtual Private Network links the user to a specific device across the internet and acts as a secure tunnel. Firewalls include built-in VPN clients which allow users to access a network protected by the firewall. But a firewall and a VPN are not the same[/et_pb_accordion_item][et_pb_accordion_item title=”What is a virtual firewall?” icon_color=”#363636” _builder_version=”4.25.1″ _module_preset=”default” body_font_size=”12px” body_line_height=”1.5em” global_colors_info=”{}” toggle_font_size=”14px” open=”on”]Virtual firewall acts like a physical firewall, and an actual hardware on-premise is not necessary to secure data on the network. Virtual firewalls monitor traffic transferred between a network and the public network, with security operations taking place in the cloud.[/et_pb_accordion_item][/et_pb_accordion][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Firewall installations is crucial part in every industry to keep a check on effective internet usage. FixLab grants the best team for Firewall installations in South India, to control and transform internet usage […]
